title: NA proceedings adjourned till Thursday due to lack of quorum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 06 (APP):Deputy Speaker of the National Assembly Syed Ghulam Mustafa Shah Monday adjourned the House proceedings till Thursday due to a lack of quorum.
The quorum was pointed out by Member of the National Assembly Nisar Ahmed Jutt. Earlier, the sitting was suspended until the completion of the quorum.
After the resumption of the session, the Deputy Speaker ordered a count. Following the count, he announced that the House was not in order and adjourned the proceedings till Thursday.
